pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Jackal, Django Rest Framework extension[![version badge](https://badge.fury.io/py/django-jackal.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/django-jackal)![jackal image](https://imgur.com/XnlU8T9.jpg)> Warning! This project is for personal use. Therefore, there are no documents, and the code changes are arbitrary.**Jackal** is extension of Django REST Framework(DRF)that help you easily implement the necessary features on your web backend server.## Installation pip install django-jackal
